english: filter

chinese: 每一层过滤层都将空气中更小的微粒过滤出来
english: each layer filters smaller particles from the air
gauge

chinese: 压力计显示了管道中的水压
english: the pressure gauge indicated the pressure of the water in the pipe
concern

chinese: 她糟糕的成绩让妈妈很是担忧
english: her poor grades concerned her mother
prestige

chinese: 由于自己在教育方面的成就，他享有很高的威望
english: he has considerable prestige owned to his educational achievements
education

chinese: 如今孩子们在课堂里接受大部分教育
english: nowadays students receive most of their education in the classroom
violate

chinese: 鸟儿的行为违反了这个标牌上的规定
english: the bird's behavior violated the sign's rules
accord

chinese: 两国最终达成和平协议，停止交战
english: the two countries finally reached a peace accord to end the war
temptation

chinese: 他没能抵抗住这些甜点的诱惑
english: he gave in to his temptation to try the desserts
whether

chinese: 这位母亲还不知道宝宝是男是女
english: the mother still doesn't know whether it's a boy or a girl
giggle

chinese: 这个小婴儿在第一次游泳时不停地咯咯笑
english: the little boy can't stop gigling when having his first swimming
community

chinese: 唐人街里住着这座城市里最庞大的华人群体
english: the largest chinese community in this city lives in its chinatown
benign

chinese: 合理使用手机对你的身体相对无害
english: responsible use of your smartphone is relatively benign
addiction
his addiction to alcohol gradually deepened
fragrant

chinese: 我喜欢这瓶香水芳香的味道
english: i love this perfume's fragrant smell
potential

chinese: 正如这匹小马一样，我们都有进步的潜力
english: just like the pony we all have the potential to improve
misleading

chinese: 这些叶子太有误导性了，导致他选了最小的那根胡萝卜
english: the leaves are very misleading he's chosen the smallest carrot
